Name: The goddess of the West
Description: This limestone relief fragment depicts the goddess Imentet. She was the personification of the West and the protective goddess of the Theban necropolis. She is depicted as a woman with the hieroglyph for the west on her head, and appears to be a form of the goddess Hathor. Her most important duty was to receive and to protect the dead in the necropolis. She never had her own cult.
